moves.name: Absorb
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.description: A sweet scent that lowers the opposing team's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

moves.name: Acid
moves.description: The opposing team is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. The acid may also lower the targets' Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Sweet Scent
moves.description: A sweet scent that lowers the opposing team's evasiveness. It also lures wild Pokémon if used in grass, etc.

moves.name: Acid
moves.description: The opposing team is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. The acid may also lower the targets' Sp. Def stats.

moves.name: Poison Powder
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust on the target. It may poison the target.

moves.name: Stun Spore
moves.description: The user scatters a cloud of paralyzing powder. It may leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Sleep Powder
moves.description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

moves.name: Mega Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Lucky Chant
moves.description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing Pokémon from landing critical hits.

moves.name: Natural Gift
moves.description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines its type and power.

moves.name: Moonlight
moves.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

moves.name: Giga Drain
moves.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

moves.name: Petal Blizzard
moves.description: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.

moves.name: Petal Dance
moves.description: The user attacks the target by scattering petals for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

moves.name: Grassy Terrain
moves.description: The user turns the ground under everyone's feet to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of Pokémon on the ground a little every turn.
